医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
COVID-19 导致有神经发育疾病儿童的家庭更加焦虑《全球健康杂志》上发表的一项同行评审研究分析了 6,600 多个有神经发育疾病 (NDC) 儿童的家庭的数据，这些儿童患有自闭症、注意力缺陷/多动障碍、发育性语言障碍、唐氏综合症、威廉姆斯综合症、和智力障碍——来自 70 个国家，包括美国。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/COVID-19-led-to-increased-anxiety-for-families-with-children-with-neurodevelopmental-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/COVID-19-led-to-increased-anxiety-for-families-with-children-with-neurodevelopmental-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aa5d8454-16cb-49c2-86c3-f3ba661df27e Mon, 31 Jul 2023 21:14:30 -0400 COVID-19 led to increased anxiety for families with children with neurodevelopmental conditions
精子包装蛋白可能是男性不育的关键精子在新生命的创造中发挥着关键作用，基本上提供了所需遗传物质的一半。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Sperm-packaging- Proteins-may-hold-key-to-male-infertility.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Sperm-packaging- Proteins-may-hold-key-to-male-infertility.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9e45768e-beba-4615-94a3-6addd8a4aa38 Mon, 31 Jul 2023 20:49:58 -0400 Sperm packaging proteins may hold key to male infertility
人类衰老成纤维细胞引发免疫缺陷小鼠肺部纤维化反应一篇新的研究论文发表在《Aging》杂志（MEDLINE/PubMed 列为“Aging (Albany NY)”和 Web of Science 列为“Aging-US”）第 15 卷第 14 期封面上，题为“Human senescent filblasts trigger Progressive小鼠肺纤维化。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Human-senescent-filamental-reaction-in-the-lungs-of-immunodeficient-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Human-senescent-太多成纤维细胞-触发纤维发生-反应-in-the-lungs-of-immunodeficient-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1f5c788e-ac7c-4935-8afb-b7b402fa2e00 Mon, 31 Jul 2023 20:45:05 -0400 Human senescent fibroblasts trigger fibrogenic reaction in the lungs of immunodeficient mice
AI 语言模型 GPT-3 在类比推理方面的表现与大学本科生相当人们无需任何特殊的培训或实践，就可以通过将新问题与熟悉的问题进行比较并将解决方案扩展到新问题来轻松解决新问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/AI-language-model-GPT-3-performs-about-as-well-as-college-undergraduates-in-anaological-reasoning.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/AI-language-model-GPT-3-performs-about-as-well-as-college-undergraduates-in-anaological-reasoning.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4f0293c-e0e4-46c4-8aa5-a5e2052a6b4c Mon, 31 Jul 2023 20:38:49 -0400 AI language model GPT-3 performs about as well as college undergraduates in analogical reasoning
研究发现，囊性纤维化的晚期诊断会导致长期健康结果较差《儿科杂志》发表了科罗拉多州儿童医院肺部专家、科罗拉多大学儿科副教授 Stacey Martiniano 医学博士的手稿。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Late-diagnosis-of-cystic-Fiberosis-leads-to-poorer-long-term-health-outcomes-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Late-diagnosis-of-cystic-fibrosis-leads-to-poorer-long-term-health-outcomes-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f55b6b0-fcd3-4fad-9b5a-2a2c7ab1d4b8 Mon, 31 Jul 2023 20:27:06 -0400 Late diagnosis of cystic fibrosis leads to poorer long-term health outcomes, study finds
研究人员发现巴氏灭菌和灭菌对椰米奶的影响无论是由大豆、杏仁、燕麦制成，还是直接来自奶牛，奶制品都必须经过热处理，以防止有害细菌生长并确保其安全。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Researchers-discover-the-effects-of-pasteurization-and-sterilization-on-coconut-rice-milk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Researchers-discover-the-effects-of-pasteurization-and-sterilization-on-coconut-rice-milk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=05bfb7bd-a484-4e2e-952f-0c39213872ec Mon, 31 Jul 2023 20:24:53 -0400 Researchers discover the effects of pasteurization and sterilization on coconut-rice milk
研究首次揭示聚电解质复合物的内部结构多年来，我们已经知道一种被称为“聚电解质复合物”的特殊分子组装体可以帮助细胞保持自身组织。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Study-reveals-internal-struct-of-poly electrolyte-complexes-for-the-first-time.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Study-reveals-internal-struct-of-poly electrolyte-complexes-for-the-first-time.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3a57b5cf-981b-4bc9-8616-d5d4094ab9dc Mon, 31 Jul 2023 20:20:36 -0400 Study reveals internal structure of polyelectrolyte complexes for the first time
研究评估支架回收器尖端设计对机械血栓切除术中远端栓塞的影响今天在神经介入外科学会 (SNIS) 第 20 届年会上发表的研究表明，在进行机械血栓切除术治疗中风时，不同类型的支架取栓器尖端可能会改善患者的预后。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Study-evaluates-impact-of-stent-retriever-tip-design-on-distal-embolization-during-mechanical-thrombection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Study-evaluates-impact-of-stent-retriever-tip-design-on-distal-embolization-during-mechanical-thrombcision.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=45488b9a-87ae-4e5d-b1cb-52aa3757cc38 Mon, 31 Jul 2023 20:17:19 -0400 Study evaluates impact of stent retriever tip design on distal embolization during mechanical thrombectomy
微量的硫化氢可以帮助人们更健康、更长寿新的研究表明，未来可以通过释放微量硫化氢 (H2S) 气体的药物来开发帮助人们延长健康生活的疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Tiny-amounts-of-Hydrogen-sulfide-could-help-people-live-healthier-for-longer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Tiny-amounts-of-Hydrogen-sulfide-could-help-people-live-healthier-for-longer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=92a156fa-f3df-4669-8082-e0115a7b491f Mon, 31 Jul 2023 20:13:39 -0400 Tiny amounts of hydrogen sulfide could help people live healthier for longer
新工具揭示了果蝇视觉系统中的新细胞类型纽约大学的研究人员在果蝇视觉系统中发现了新的细胞类型，他们通过创建一种在发育过程中发现和标记神经元的工具使之成为可能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Novel-tool-uncovers-new-cell-types-in-the-visual-system-of-flies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Novel-tool-uncovers-new-cell-types-in-the-visual-system-of-flies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=441c81b2-af4e-4fef-a4f9-a9b75ffc5a1c Mon, 31 Jul 2023 20:09:43 -0400 Novel tool uncovers new cell types in the visual system of flies
